name: Rocket Road
description:
A game developed by myself https://curtisphillips.weebly.com/ and Teresa Melendez https://tea3d.artstation.com/

Play as an Ice Cream truck driver trying to meet their daily quota that increases daily for some reason. Each child wants their perfect flavor. Vanilla, Strawberry, or Chocolate. I could do with some Strawberry myself but then I wouldn't be able to type this description.

Enjoy, ROCKET ROAD
